pr_title: [vf, jsp] Adapt JSP & VF modules to new javacc wrapper

timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText:
We need to deprecate/internalize first on master.
We should directly make the AST node final now
The setter setName() can be package-private.
timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText: Not sure, whether we decided yet: Are the *TokenManager classes internal api or not? The JavaTokenManager isn't...
timeline.author: adangel

replies.bodyText: I'll remove @Deprecated and keep @InternalApi for now...
replies.author: adangel
